network.protocol

Class ProtocolStringConverter

  • java.lang.Object
    • network.protocol.ProtocolStringConverter

  • public class ProtocolStringConverter
extends java.lang.Object
    A collection of functions for converting protocol Strings to other Objects and vice versa.
    Author:
    Christoph Hermann
